thread.title: Scott Disick Parties All Day and All Night With New Mystery Blonde
thread.title_full: Scott Disick Parties All Day and All Night With New Mystery Blonde

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Scott Disick Parties All Day and All Night With New Mystery Blonde
text:
Comments Kourtney Kardashian's ex was spotted hitting up several parties with a pretty blonde woman in New York City on Wednesday, September 30. 
Scott Disick was spotted partying all day and all night long with a mystery blonde in New York City on Wednesday, September 30. They hit up several parties together before emerging on Thursday morning at 6 A.M. In some photos obtained by TMZ , the blonde woman kept close to Scott at all times. They were seen laughing and joking around together. Kourtney Kardashian 's ex tried to keep a low profile wearing a blue baseball cap, a black shirt, jeans and brown suede shoes. The woman donned a grey mini dress with a light blue cardigan and blue boots. According to the site, Scott and the woman began their party adventure at his hotel. The pair were seen walking out of the Trump Soho on Wednesday afternoon. They then hit up an East Village bar, a house party and eventually 1 OAK Nightclub. They continued their party at the Soho House, where they eventually emerged on Thursday morning. A source tells PEOPLE of Scott and the woman, "They were hanging out in V.I.P., and he seemed pretty into her. They were sitting pretty close - he had his arm around her, and they were cuddling. He was getting drinks for her. They were together most of the night." According to the source, Scott wasn't drinking alcohol during his time at 1 OAK. "He was just sipping on Cokes all night," the source explains. "He didn't seem like his usual 'Scott Disick' self. He was being pretty chill."
